paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper describes a case of a patient with a germline pathogenic variant in the BRCA2 gene, detailing the variant's clinical significance and associated penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Here, we describe a case of an 81-year-old female diagnosed with ductal triple negative breast cancer with a germline pathogenic variant in BReast CAncer gene2 (BRCA2).

functional_data.summary: The mutation is predicted to alter RNA splicing, potentially leading to an abnormal mRNA or an aberrant protein.

variants.additional_notes: The variant has been reported in other breast and ovarian cancer patients.
key_quotes: This mutation has been reported in other breast and ovarian cancer patients.

tables_processed.table_caption: Genetic alterations detected in the tumor.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information regarding the BRCA2 variant.
